beer.name: XS: Imperial Porter
beer.description: This is a huge mouthful of malt and hops. It has notes of bitter rich chocolate and hints of tar. A new hop called Summit was used to give it the perfect hop balance. This porter is the creme de la creme.
beer.grains: 2-row Pale, C120, C150, Kiln coffee, black and chocolate malts.
2-row Pale, C120, C150, Kiln coffee, black and chocolate malts.
